label: CSV Transformation
description: Every time a button is clicked, take an object called 'offices.csv' from AWS S3 with the key 'files/offices.csv'. Reduce number of columns in the csv file to ['F-NOM0103','F-COD0047','F-LOC0001','NUM0366']. Upload the file

tasks.label: Retrieve an object from AWS S3
tasks.name: awsS3_1
tasks.description: Get an object called 'office.csv' with the key 'files/office.csv'

tasks.label: Turn the csv file into a data pill
tasks.name: csvFile_1

iteratee.label: Create a data pill object for csv row
iteratee.name: var_1
iteratee.description: Create a data pill object for item columns: 'F-NOM0103','F-COD0047','F-LOC0001' and 'NUM0366'

iteratee.label: Store the variable object data pill into a list
iteratee.name: dataStorage_1
iteratee.description: Store the variable object data pill into a list under a key: 'list'

tasks.label: Get a variable object
tasks.name: dataStorage_2
tasks.description: Get a variable object under a key: 'list'

tasks.label: Convert a data pill into a csv file
tasks.name: csvFile_2

tasks.label: Put the csv file into AWS S3
tasks.name: awsS3_2
tasks.description: Put the csv file into AWS S3 under a key: 'files/offices_reduced.csv'
